name: The Alliance of Democracies Foundation
goal: The Alliance of Democracies Foundation is a non-profit organization founded in 2017 by Anders Fogh Rasmussen, the former NATO Secretary General and former Prime Minister of Denmark. The Foundation is dedicated to the advancement of democracy and free markets across the globe and runs three programs: democracy summit, expeditionary economics and campaign for democracy.
interests: Borders and Security, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: We follow files involving Civil Society, Democracy, Elections interference, Cybersecurity, Security, Economic growth
